title: league of legends frame by frame animation

embed.description: ‚óò Support ‚óò *miltfox* classic frame by frame animation This animations I started back in 2015 when Quinn was meta in the jungle however because of my motivation and lack of time I delayed this project all the way to 2018.

body: I usually don't get much attention when it comes to sharing my art but I though it is interesting enough to share it to the lol community{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: I subbed for more, do you have any other instructions, sensei?
Thank you :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I like the animation and style, but I wish I could understand what everyone is saying though most of the time. Also I don't understand why Valor dropped Quinn into the river near the beginning?
Valor was very mean she was very heavy {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

on a side note I would love to help with remixing and balancing the audio for this, if that could be a possibility. 

fixing the audio would make this a masterpiece

Am using software: animation CC for drawing + audio and edit all  using camtasia studios 9. At the start I wanted to make quinn go mental boom that's why it's hard to understand her especially at the beginning, also I had intention to make it  harder to understand as she is just mumbling something on the path. you can tell by her behaviour trough out the episode  she is very impulsive yet tries to act like a leader even through out she does nothing much at all her rapters got stolen and Valor drops her XD. 
to be honest when I do my drawings the characters make up the story on their own it's fascinating how it worked out to be.

As for remixes I would loved if someone could make up for me perhaps I could re-upload one day the whole clip again with proper audio.  
Note that Am lacking in self-exposer if only I found a way to be more successful artist I would upload and create new staff every week, but as for now It's hard to see a light in end of the tunnel if I keep making animated videos. Am a Man with potential. {{summoner:13}}
I approve of this.

I wanted this, and now you can all have it. 

https://gfycat.com/VacantUnknownAmericanavocet
hahaha xD epic
That ending with Kennen was the best thing I've seen in a while. This is great!
I love how you simplified each champions looks but still made them recognizable. Can't wait to see more!!!

I really like it! üòÅ
Subbed!

Hey, I really like this! Nice animation!

I know you already seem to have voices down, but if you ever need any voice work done in the future, I'd be more than happy to help out.

:)
This is very good, the animation style is unique. Hope to see more of your work!

How many frames are there, and how long did this take you to produce?

Very good work, I especially liked Kennen dancing on Vayne's corpse and flashing his mastery.

I started it back in 2015~2016 but I finished it only now  because I had some motivation issues and time, but if I had to give it a close call it would be around 3 months drawing 2 days in a week. am not sure if I will keep animating league of legends videos am having a difficulty in finding exposer with it which would have kept me motivated.
as for the kennen my first idea was a sion who TP's in and runs on to the Vayne but kennen felt so fun idea and I went for it as a bm troll {{sticker:vayne-pose}}
Awesome video! I love watching league animations and this one made me laugh. Art style is cool, but sound need a bit of work because it's hard to understand what the characters said.
Amazing work! The words were hard to pick out though.

Melee {{champion:69}}  on an {{champion:81}}

I looooooooooooooooove it to death. Looooooooooove it.
